org.pikater.web.vaadin

Class UniversalUIExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.server.AbstractClientConnector
      • com.vaadin.server.AbstractExtension
        • org.pikater.web.vaadin.UniversalUIExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.server.ClientConnector, com.vaadin.server.Extension, com.vaadin.shared.Connector, java.io.Serializable

    public class UniversalUIExtension
extends com.vaadin.server.AbstractExtension
    A special extension to UI that enables logging client issues on the server and some other things.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl
    See Also:
